base_id.title: Base ID
base_id.description: The ID of the base you want to extract tables from.

table_name.title: Table name
table_name.description: The name of the table in Airtable base you want to download.

filter_by_formula.title: Filter by formula
filter_by_formula.description: Optional predicate (expression that evaluates to true or false) Airtable field formula. For syntax refer here

fields.title: Fields
fields.description: The fields you want to download. You may leave this empty to download all fields.

table_name.title: Storage Table Name
table_name.description: Name of the destination table. Source table name will be used if not specified.

incremental_loading.title: Load Type
incremental_loading.description: If Full load is used, the destination table will be overwritten every run. If Incremental Load is used, data will be upserted into the destination table.
